channel.title: Manage access :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Manage access Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: Scope includes managing user and application access to resources. Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Structure type: Navigation Content type: Guide Hub A guide hub is the main navigation page for a section, such as learn, plan, or build. It begins with “Who this section is for?” and how the user may have gotten to this page, i.

item.title: Test your access configurations with an simulation
item.description: Test your access configurations with an simulation Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: - Test your policies with access simulations: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/policy-simulation/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code. item.title: Enable a user consent dialog for an app
item.description: Enable a user consent dialog for an app Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: This article discusses how to enable a consent dialog for an app wanting permission to access certain resources Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - This guide needs to main things: - Content answer “When would I use this user consent functionality over other methods?

item.title: Set up delegated access to a resource
item.description: Set up delegated access to a resource Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: This article was placed under “Manage access” because it discuss delegated “access” to other apps. item.description: Manage access to org objects with role assignments Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: See the “Existing content link) field for more details. The impetus of this new guide is the guide below.
